  output:
    word_document:
      reference_docx: docx-style.docx
---


```{r t, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
if(class(table) != "list"){
  table = list(table)
}

if(is.null(table_name)){
  table_name = paste("Table",seq_along(table))
}

if(is.null(table_note)){
  table_note = rep(" ",length(table))
}

for(i in seq_along(table)){
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("\n\n")

  if("indent" %in% names(table[[i]])){
    stub_indents = list(table[[i]]$indent)
    table[[i]]$indent = NULL
  } else{
    stub_indents = NULL
  }
    
  
  cat(papaja::apa_table(table[i], caption = table_name[i],stub_indents = stub_indents , note = table_note[i], escape = F))

  #cat(knitr::kable((table[i])))
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
